	[5707] heading "Earn your master's from Berkeley Engineering without putting your career on pause"
	[5711] StaticText 'Ready to advance, transform, and enhance your career in engineering and technology? Earn your Master of Advanced Study in Engineering (MAS-E) from Berkeley Engineering,\xa0'
	[5713] StaticText 'consistently ranked among the top three engineering schools in the country by\xa0'
	[5716] StaticText 'U.S. News & World Report'
	[5720] StaticText 'Designed for part-time, self-paced study, the MAS-E program gives you the ability to complete your masterâ€™s without putting your career on pause.\xa0'
	[5722] StaticText 'Learn on your schedule with courses across four distinct concentrations, providing you with extended skill sets across different types of engineering'
	[5723] StaticText '. Through this program, you will learn from and interact with the elite faculty at Berkeley Engineering to develop the critical knowledge and technical skills you need to succeed at the highest levels in your career.'
	[5724] heading 'Customize your degree for your unique career goals'
	[5728] StaticText 'Design your degree learning journey with the '
	[5729] link 'Berkeley MAS-E Degree Planner,' url: https://mas-e.engineering.berkeley.edu/curriculum-planner/?concentration=infrastructure-energy-and-the-environment
	[5731] StaticText ' your comprehensive guide to exploring and creating your unique plan to help you meet your career goals. Save and share your plan with a Berkeley Engineering academic advisor.'
	[5733] StaticText 'With 4 distinct interdisciplinary concentrations to choose from, the degree is truly versatile to provide a well-rounded engineering education:'
	[5740] heading 'Infrastructure, energy, and the environment'
	[5743] StaticText 'This concentration puts you on track for roles such as Infrastructure Project Manager, Structural Engineer, Sustainability Consultant, and Geotechnical Engineer.'
	[5750] heading 'Advanced Manufacturing and Materials'
	[5753] StaticText 'This concentration puts you on track for roles such as Manufacturing Engineer, Materials Scientist, Product Development Engineer, and Industrial Engineer.'
	[5760] heading 'Electronics and systems engineering'
	[5763] StaticText 'This concentration puts you on track for roles such as Electrical Engineer, and Renewable Energy Engineer.'
	[5770] heading 'Robotics and Controls'
	[5773] StaticText 'This concentration puts you on track for roles such as Robotics Engineer, and Autonomous Systems Developer.'
